Key Match Events: Rasethuntsa (53') scored the only goal for Lesotho
Babicka (55') and Junior Effaghe (84') scored for Gabon
Pre-Game Insights: Lesotho are likely to name a similar starting XI to the side that drew with Gabon last time out

Gabon may start a similar defence to the one that drew against Lesotho, with goalkeeper Loyce Mbaba likely to be shielded by defenders Anthony Oyono, Aaron Appindangoye, Alex Moucketou-Moussounda and Urie-Michel Mboula
Post-Match Reflections: Without Aubameyang leading the line, Gabon could struggle to finish many of their chances in front of goal
Lesotho's defensive resilience was key in their previous encounter with Gabon
Miscellaneous Highlights: Lesotho have drawn three and lost six of their nine most recent home games
Gabon's away form in recent weeks has been poor, losing their last three fixtures on the road
